mapper.select: select userPwd from board b, member m where boardNum=#{boardNum} and userPwd=mypack.encrypt(#{userPwd}) and b.userID=m.userID
select commentNum, boardNum, adminId, commentContent, to_char(commentDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH:mi:ss') commentDate from board_comment bc where boardNum=#{boardNum} order by commentNum
select boardFileName from board where boardNum=#{boardNum}

select count(*) from board
where ${search_option} like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
where userID like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or boardTitle like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or boardContent like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
mapper.insert: insert into board (boardNum,boardTitle, groupNum,re_order,re_depth,boardContent,boardFileName,boardFileSize) values ((select nvl (max(boardNum)+1,1) from board), #{boardTItle}, (select nvl(max(boardNum)+1,1) from board), 1, 0, #{boardContent}, #{boardFileName},#{boardFileSize})
insert into board_comment (commentNum,boardNum,userID,boardContent) values ((select nvl(max(commentNum)+1,1) from board_comment), #{boardNum},#{userID},#{boardContent})

insert into board (boardNum,userID,boardTitle,userPwd,groupNum re_order,re_depth,boardContent,boardFileName,boardFileSize) values ((select nvl(max(boardNum)+1,1) from board), #{userID}, #{boardtitle},#{userPwd},#{groupNum},#{re_order},#{re_depth}, #{boardContent},#{boardFileName},#{boardFileSize})
mapper.update: update board set hit=hit+1 where boardNum=#{boardNum}
update board set boardTitle=#{boardTitle}, boardContent=#{boardContent}, boardFileName=#{boardFileName}, boardFileSize=#{boardFileSize}, down=#{down} where boardNum=#{boardNum}
update board set re_order=re_order + 1 where groupNum=#{groupNum} and re_order >= #{re_order}
update board set down=down+1 where boardNum=#{boardNum}
